title: Buzzer: Last Mile Tech For Live Moments in Sports
itunes:title: Buzzer: Last Mile Tech For Live Moments in Sports
description:
The media landscape is changing, and so is the way people consume live sports. Buzzer, a highly personalized notification-driven mobile sports platform, is here to compliment and simplify the sports ecosystem. Founder and CEO Bo Han joins Jason, Barr, and Lynch to discuss how Buzzer is partnering up with leagues and media services to bring fans exactly what they want to see- their favorite teams, players, and highlights all on one platform.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
